entry.title: "MIT Media Lab Design Innovation Workshop '15"
entry.summary:
This post is about the 5th MIT Media Lab Design Innovation Workshop which I was fortunate to be a part of.

TL;DR: The experience in 1 para:

“Time is tricky. You have months, even years, nothing changes a speck if you don’t go anywhere or do anything new. Yet, time can hit you with a day or an hour when so much happens it’s almost you are born all over again into some brand-new person.” - E.R. Frank (Life is Crazy)
